name: The F-One Button
description:
The F-One Button is a game made during de 1-Bit Jam under the theme 'One Button'.

It tells the story of the f one button that got separated from its family and now needs your help to get back to them. 

During the gameplay you'll find platform puzzles and will count on the help of other lost buttons to get through your journey. You can play it by using WASD or the arrow keys and by pressing the specified keys found in the game you can activate a new ability to help with the platforms.
